actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on diaper shells each having a water-resistant outer layer of laminated knitted fabric of polyester and a lining of mesh fabric wholly of polyester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on diaper shells each having a water-resistant outer layer of laminated knitted fabric of polyester and a lining of mesh fabric wholly of polyester.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on diaper shells each having a water-resistant outer layer of laminated knitted fabric of polyester and a lining of mesh fabric wholly of polyester.
